item.description:
Hey Jumbos

Let's toss on our thinking caps and show-off our gray matter. Orleans Restaurant hosts a trivia contest at 8PM on Wednesday night. So, let's gather around 7PM, chow on some apps, possibly share a cold beverage or two, then break-up into groups of five and kick some trivial tail.

Orleans even gives out prizes for first and second place as well as a roll-over jackpot which will be awarded to the next team to answer every answer correctly. At last count, the roll-over jackpot was more than $250, so bring your A-game and you might walk away with a few extra Benjamins.

Let's show 'em that a Tufts elephant never forgets!

As always, you are encouraged to forward this invitation to any colleague who you think might be interested in attending this meet-up or joining the group.
item.name: Jumbo Happy Hour & Trivia
